generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white lane markings and a bicycle symbol, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: The pedestrian is walking on a paved area with a curb, which is a sidewalk.
- building: The red and gray buildings with storefronts and signs are clearly visible.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are present along the sidewalk and road.
- person: A man in a teal shirt is walking on the sidewalk.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver hatchback and a white van.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a right-turn arrow is visible on the right side of the image.
- pole: A pole with the traffic sign is visible on the right side of the image.
